description.value: This suite comes equipped with hidden storage compartments, which have a capacity equal to half your ship's base cargo capacity, as shown in the @JournalEntry[pMX6ND1g3oNyo09c]{Starship Size Cargo Capacity} table on page 55. Finding the hidden storage compartments requires a successful DC 20 Intelligence (Investigation) or Wisdom (Perception) check, which is made with disadvantage.
